testcaseName: Dose 1 to dose 2 interval 6 mo-5 days=invalid
forecastTestType: Recommended based on minimum interval from invalid dose
generalDescription: This test case describes when the second dose of the 2 dose Hep A vaccine is administered at 6 months - 5 days after the first dose, that the dose is not considered to be valid.  A repeat dose should be forecasted.
reasonForChange: V1.1: Past Due Date was previously calculated based on an interval, but should have been calculated based on age of 24 months + 4 weeks - 1 day
